method.name: GET
method.doc:
To discover available updates with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the available updates URI. This operation will tell the appliance to contact the update server to check for any available updates.
This API will attempt to contact the online update server to retrieve information about any available update packages.
This API does not return any data. Use the List the available updates API to retrieve the available updates after this operation is completed.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service
